title: Will trade for T206 HOF's I need
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: Will trade for T206 HOF's I need
posts.post_content:
***CARD IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE** TRADED TO ANOTHER MEMBER**
THANKS ALL........

Would trade for T206 HOF's I need in presentable VG/EX or better condition. The Cobby card below is what I'd throw on the table if anyone is interested. My lengthy list is below the scan of what HOF's I still need. Drop me a pm or email if you feel like doing a little horse trad'in. I can come in with cash if what you have equals more than the Cobby. Trade value is set at $1150. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/sportkingcobbfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/sportkingcobbback.jpg[/IMG]
